mapper.select: SELECT MS_NUM ,MS_NAME ,MS_ID ,MS_FIRST_PHONE1 ,CAST(AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(MS_MID_PHONE1), 'JBOG')as CHAR) as MS_MID_PHONE1 ,MS_LAST_PHONE1 ,MS_HOMEZIP ,MS_HOMEADDR1 ,MS_HOMEADDR2 ,CAST(AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(MS_HOMETEL), 'JBOG')as CHAR) as MS_HOMETEL ,MS_BIRTH ,MS_SEX FROM MS_MAININFO WHERE MS_ID = #{id} AND MS_PASSWORD = SHA2(#{pw},256)
